messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Closed for Learn Nothing Day?
messages.msgSnippet: -=-but noticed on the SALE flyer that theier office would be closed on July 24th...Maybe for Learn Nothing Day!!?!!-=- The fact that they re closing, and the
messages.messageBody:
-=-but noticed on the SALE flyer that theier office would be closed on
July 24th...Maybe for Learn Nothing Day!!?!!-=-

The fact that they're closing, and the fact that it's Learn Nothing
Day creates a correlation.
Most research is based on correlation.
It seems you've done research.

We need more data points to "prove" that homeschooling-related
businesses are starting to observe Learn Nothing Day, but this is a
start.

Thanks!

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Closed for Learn Nothing Day?
messages.msgSnippet: Reading my e-mail, I opened an advertisement from a large curriculum company (not really paying attention) but noticed on the SALE flyer that theier office
messages.messageBody: Reading my e-mail, I opened an advertisement from a large curriculum company (not really paying attention) but noticed on the SALE flyer that theier office would be closed on July 24th...Maybe for Learn Nothing Day!!?!!
